    • Method Detail

      • destinationReached

        public boolean destinationReached()
        Returns:
        true if the bot has reached its destination. TODO: convert to a destination queue

      • gotoCoord

        public void gotoCoord(VisionCoordinate vc)
        Navigates the bot to (x,y) using its built in navigator. Requires an active vision system and association between the bot and the system.
        Parameters:
        vc - The coordinate to go to, under the canonical vision system.

      • left

        public void left(double power)
        bot translates left
        Parameters:
        power - the amount of power that should be supplied to the wheels. It should be between 0 and 100

      • right

        public void right(double power)
        bot translates right
        Parameters:
        power - the amount of power that should be supplied to the wheels. It should be between 0 and 100

      • setWheelPower

        public boolean setWheelPower(double fl,
                             double fr,
                             double bl,
                             double br)
        Description copied from interface: FourWheelMovement
        Sets the wheel power for all four wheels. Wheel power should be a number from -100 to 100. Note that negative number imply the wheel is moving backwards
        Parameters:
        fl - power to set the front left wheel
        fr - power to set the front right wheel
        bl - power to set the back left wheel
        br - power to set the back right wheel
        Returns:
        true if the command was likely successful

      • sendKV

        public boolean sendKV(java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.String value)
        Description copied from interface: CommandCenter
        Sends an arbitrary key and value over the associated bot's connection. Should only be used for quick prototyping, with the goal of creating a method wrapper around sending the KV.
        Parameters:
        key - A key to identify the type of command
        value - The value of the command
        Returns:
        True if the command seems to have sent correctly
